original_listing.title: Pebble Black Nickel Glass Drop-In or Undermount Oval Bathroom Sink (19.5-in x 16.25-in) 007-307-022, Brand New, Retails 499$

reasoning: This is a brand new, high-end JSG Oceana glass sink (model 007-307-022) with a distinctive Pebble Black Nickel finish. The retail price is stated as $499. Specialty bath fixtures generally retain good resale value when new. I estimated the total market value at $225, which is approximately 45% of the retail price, accounting for the inherent difficulty and cost of shipping fragile glass items. Expert Advice: When listing, be sure to note whether the sink includes the necessary drain assembly or mounting hardware (like mounting clips), as glass sinks sometimes require specialized parts. Clear photos of the packaging showing 'MADE IN THE USA' (JSG Oceana is based in Jeannette, PA) should also be emphasized, as US-made products are often sought after in the home improvement market.
